thread.title: BRIT Awards 2017: Chris Martin slammed for George Michael tribute
thread.title_full: BRIT Awards 2017: Chris Martin slammed for George Michael tribute

title: BRIT Awards 2017: Chris Martin slammed for George Michael tribute
text:
BRIT Awards 2017: Chris Martin slammed for George Michael tribute BRIT Awards 2017: Chris Martin slammed for George Michael tribute BRIT AWARDS 2017 viewers were teary-eyed tonight when George Michael was honoured with a performance from Coldplay’s Chris Martin - but it certainly wasn’t without its very vocal critics. PUBLISHED: 21:08, Wed, Feb 22, 2017 | UPDATED: 21:24, Wed, Feb 22, 2017 
The singer took to the stage to sing a stripped-back rendition of A Different Corner. 
To pack an extra emotional punch, George’s own previous vocals were played alongside Chris’s. 
The segment even featured a nod to Prince, who sadly also lost his life in 2016. 
Unfortunately the performance was as slammed as it was lauded. Related articles
